wikipedia_page.main: David Kenneth Stone (born 29 December 1942) is a former professional footballer, who played 154 times in The Football League for Bristol Rovers and Southend United. He also played for and managed a number of non-League clubs following the end of his professional career.

response: 1973–1974: After a number of mid table finishes; Manager and former Bristol Rovers player David Stone, won their fifth championship by a single point from Taunton Town.
:*David Stone (military historian) (born 1947), British Army officer and military historian
:*David Stone (politician) (1770–1818), American politician, Governor of North Carolina and U.S. Senator
:*David Stone (producer) (born 1966), American theatre and musical producer</onlyinclude>
*Joshua David Stone (died 2005), author and meditation teacher
